title: Senior Smart Contract Engineer
summary: Build and deploy secure smart contracts for DeFi protocols
description: We're looking for a Senior Smart Contract Engineer to join our team and help build the next generation of DeFi protocols. You'll be responsible for designing, implementing, and auditing smart contracts that handle millions of dollars in value.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in smart contract development
Expert knowledge of Solidity and Ethereum ecosystem
Experience with DeFi protocols (AMMs, lending, derivatives)
Strong understanding of security best practices
Experience with testing frameworks (Hardhat, Foundry)
Knowledge of gas optimization techniques
benefits: Top-tier equipment and home office setup

title: Crypto Research Analyst
summary: Analyze market trends and emerging crypto technologies
description: Join our research team to analyze cryptocurrency markets, emerging technologies, and investment opportunities. You'll work closely with our engineering and product teams to inform strategic decisions.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in crypto/blockchain research
Strong analytical and quantitative skills
Experience with data analysis tools (Python, R, SQL)
Knowledge of DeFi, NFTs, and emerging crypto trends
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
CFA or similar financial certification preferred
benefits: Access to premium research tools and data

title: Frontend Developer (Web3)
summary: Build intuitive interfaces for blockchain applications

requirements: 3+ years of frontend development experience
Proficiency in React, TypeScript, and modern CSS
Experience with Web3 libraries (ethers.js, web3.js)
Knowledge of wallet integrations (MetaMask, WalletConnect)
Experience with responsive design and accessibility
Understanding of blockchain concepts and DeFi protocols

title: DevOps Engineer (Blockchain Infrastructure)
summary: Manage and scale blockchain infrastructure and cloud services
description: Join our infrastructure team to build and maintain the systems that power our blockchain applications. You'll work with cutting-edge technologies to ensure high availability and performance.
requirements: 4+ years of DevOps/Infrastructure experience
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Knowledge of containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Experience with blockchain node management
Proficiency in infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Strong scripting skills (Bash, Python, Go)

title: Product Manager (DeFi)
summary: Lead product strategy for decentralized finance applications

Deep understanding of DeFi protocols and mechanics
Experience with agile development methodologies
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and leadership abilities
Technical background preferred

title: Security Engineer (Blockchain)
summary: Secure our blockchain infrastructure and smart contracts
description: Join our security team to protect our blockchain infrastructure and smart contracts. You'll conduct security audits, implement security best practices, and help build a security-first culture.
requirements: 3+ years of security engineering experience
Experience with smart contract security auditing
Knowledge of common blockchain vulnerabilities
Experience with penetration testing and vulnerability assessment
Strong understanding of cryptography and security protocols
Relevant security certifications preferred
